price: 21. Kaadu diggah xayuk raqta digaalá ken tammoysenno (addunyâ digaalá kinnuk) kaxxa digaalák naharat (akeerâ digaalá kinnuk) koroosannuu kee dambittek iimaan fan gacaanâ gidih.
arabic: وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَدۡنَىٰ دُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walanudhīqannahum mina al-ʿadhābi al-adnā dūna al-ʿadhābi al-akbari laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
translations: And surely, We will let them taste
